mapper.select: select plan_name from plan_table where plan_no = ( SELECT plan_no FROM ( SELECT p.plan_no, COUNT(po.plan_no) AS num_plans FROM plan_table p LEFT JOIN plan_order po ON p.plan_no = po.plan_no WHERE biz_id = #{bizid} GROUP BY p.plan_no ORDER BY num_plans DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 )

WITH date_range AS ( SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) - LEVEL + 1 AS order_date FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7 ) SELECT date_range.order_date, NVL(order_cnt, 0) AS order_cnt FROM date_range LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TRUNC(order_date) AS order_date, COUNT(*) AS order_cnt FROM plan_order JOIN plan_table USING (plan_no) WHERE plan_no IN ( SELECT plan_no FROM plan_table WHERE biz_name LIKE ( SELECT biz_name FROM biz WHERE biz_id = #{bizid} ) ) AND TRUNC(order_date) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE - 7) GROUP BY TRUNC(order_date) ) plan_order_count ON date_range.order_date = plan_order_count.order_date ORDER BY date_range.order_date

SELECT p.plan_name, p.plan_no, COUNT(po.plan_no) AS planApply_cnt FROM plan_table p LEFT OUTER JOIN plan_order po ON p.plan_no = po.plan_no WHERE p.biz_name LIKE (SELECT biz_name FROM biz WHERE biz_id = #{bizid}) GROUP BY p.plan_no, p.plan_name ORDER BY p.plan_no ASC

SELECT p.plan_no, COALESCE(COUNT(po.plan_no), 0) AS todayPlanApply_cnt FROM plan_table p LEFT OUTER JOIN plan_order po ON p.plan_no = po.plan_no AND TRUNC(po.ORDER_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSTIMESTAMP) WHERE p.biz_name LIKE (SELECT biz_name FROM biz WHERE biz_id = #{bizid}) GROUP BY p.plan_no ORDER BY p.plan_no ASC

select AGE_GROUP, count(*) AS age_cnt from (SELECT user_id, CASE WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(USER_SSN, 1, 6), 'RRMMDD'))/12) BETWEEN 10 AND 19 THEN '10대' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(USER_SSN, 1, 6), 'RRMMDD'))/12) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN '20대' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(USER_SSN, 1, 6), 'RRMMDD'))/12) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN '30대' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(USER_SSN, 1, 6), 'RRMMDD'))/12) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN '40대' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(USER_SSN, 1, 6), 'RRMMDD'))/12) BETWEEN 50 AND 59 THEN '50대' ELSE '60대이상' END AS AGE_GROUP FROM ( SELECT user_id,user_ssn FROM user_table WHERE user_id IN ( SELECT user_id FROM plan_order WHERE plan_no = ( SELECT plan_no FROM ( SELECT p.plan_no, COUNT(po.plan_no) AS num_plans FROM plan_table p LEFT JOIN plan_order po ON p.plan_no = po.plan_no WHERE biz_id = #{bizid} GROUP BY p.plan_no ORDER BY num_plans DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1 ) ) ) ) GROUP BY AGE_GROUP

select AGE_GROUP, count(*) AS age_cnt from (SELECT user_id, CASE WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(USER_SSN, 1, 6), 'RRMMDD'))/12) BETWEEN 10 AND 19 THEN '10대' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(USER_SSN, 1, 6), 'RRMMDD'))/12) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN '20대' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(USER_SSN, 1, 6), 'RRMMDD'))/12) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN '30대' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(USER_SSN, 1, 6), 'RRMMDD'))/12) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN '40대' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(USER_SSN, 1, 6), 'RRMMDD'))/12) BETWEEN 50 AND 59 THEN '50대' ELSE '60대이상' END AS AGE_GROUP FROM ( SELECT user_id,user_ssn FROM user_table WHERE user_id IN ( select user_id from plan_order where biz_id = #{bizid} ) ) )GROUP BY AGE_GROUP

SELECT DECODE(SUBSTR(user_ssn, 8, 1), '1', '남', '2', '여', '3', '남', '4', '여') gender, COUNT(*) gender_cnt FROM user_table WHERE user_id IN ( SELECT user_id FROM plan_order WHERE plan_no = ( SELECT plan_no FROM ( SELECT p.plan_no, COUNT(po.plan_no) AS num_plans FROM plan_table p LEFT JOIN plan_order po ON p.plan_no = po.plan_no WHERE biz_id = #{bizid} GROUP BY p.plan_no ORDER BY num_plans DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1 ) ) GROUP BY DECODE(SUBSTR(user_ssn, 8, 1), '1', '남', '2', '여', '3', '남', '4', '여')

SELECT DECODE(SUBSTR(user_ssn, 8, 1), '1', '남', '2', '여', '3', '남', '4', '여') as gender, COUNT(*) gender_cnt FROM user_table where user_id in ( select user_id from plan_order where biz_id = #{bizid} ) GROUP BY DECODE(SUBSTR(user_ssn, 8, 1), '1', '남', '2', '여', '3', '남', '4', '여')
